original_text: “If the defiling mold reappears in the house after the stones have been torn out and the house scraped and plastered,
korean_text: 돌을 빼내며 집을 긁고 고쳐 바른 후에 색점이 집에 재발하면

sentences.original_text: If the defiling mold reappears in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 부정한 곰팡이가 집에 다시 나타난다면

sentences.original_text: after the stones have been torn out
